PathOfBuilding.Notes:
lclick - xd d - haste rclick - lancing q - arcanist brand w - shield charge e - frostblink r - molten shell t - vaal molten shell or haste
ES for vaal haste is shit. Can lvl 1 blessing, 30% mana cost as life mastery, get more es on gear xd, Melding fixes it but 4pts. Missing leech but doesn't seem worth it with 1.5k regen and end cry 2k heal on 3.5s cd. Maybe get on ring if lucky. Hard af to get 2pts for it on cluster.
A solution to both the above points is to path thru ES nodes in center instead of witch. Lose 18% life and glorious vanity notable but gain enough ES (also lose some mana) for blessing, and gain 2 pts. Probably do this if can't get a good glorious vanity (arm/pdr, fire dmg/leech, life/regen).
Can do triple warcry setup (end cry, infernal, ancestral). Move VMS to other links. Need inc duration for permanent end cry buff (8pdr, 8 all res), and inc dur is nice on VMS. Infernal cry ash is only 12% and Polaric is pretty good so infernal cry is pretty weak tbh. Ancestral cry armour at 20 power is real nice. Maybe get some white sockets and take out arca brand/desecrate for mapping and put in something like cwdt molten shell here.
